roleset.name: Describe or represent in terms of a parameter
roleset.note: Based on cryo data. Comparison to represent.01 and describe.01. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie.

example.name: parameterization-n: with arg 2
example.text: The parameterization of a line as a linear combination of two points
example.arg: as a linear combination of two points

example.name: parameterise-v
example.text: Sea ice melt pont fraction (fp), linked with lower sea ice surface albedo and increased light transmittance to the ocean, is inadequately parameterised in sea ice models due to a lack of observations.
example.arg: Sea ice melt pont fraction (fp), linked with lower sea ice surface albedo and increased light transmittance to the ocean,
due to a lack of observations
